name: Natiruts
description: '''Natiruts''' was a Brazilian [[reggae]] band from [[Brasília]]. Formed in 1996, Natiruts has released six studio albums and five live albums during a career spanning three decades. The group released its debut album ''[[Nativus]]'' in 1997 and increased in popularity through its 2009 album ''Raçaman'' and the accompanying single "Sorri, Sou Rei". The group's 2012 album ''Acústico'' was nominated for Best Brazilian Contemporary Pop Album at the [[14th Annual Latin Grammy Awards|2013 Latin Grammy Awards]].
